ygData.subject: "Peace" at the Cybertronian Fire

Subject: "Peace" at the Cybertronian Fire
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Soulstice, I'm personally anti-Maximal, Autobot, and Predacon and 
pro-Decepticon.   I want to see every last of my enemies dead at my 
characters' feet.  But I won't be cheap and have my characters lose just for 
my own goals unless I don't like the characters and I feel better to kill 
them off now then later)

The Oblitercons/The Protectobots/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/Sun 
Crusher/Reflector/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Vehement/Firestarter/Unitron:



Dark One rolled in the air, avoiding the barrage of lasers.  He opened a 
comm. link to IR.  

"When I said a cease fire, I meant no one shot at me.  Call the idiot 
attacking me off before my comrades and I gut him and hang his corpse up 
against the CF as a decoration.  By the way, sensors still detect Alliance 
forces inside your ship, and I haven't seen any prisoners come out yet.  
Speed things up.  Most of our troops are rather triggerhappy, yet not as much 
as yours."

---

Breakdown fired off a sonic arc from his blaster, a couple seconds later 
firing another off at Tarantopulous

---

Hiss fired off four fusion blasts from his cannon at Tarantopulous' chest.

---

Scavenger continued pulling on Pyro's arm, pulling him up inch by inch 
through the thick mud.

---

Hot Spot cursed as he saw First Aid and Blades.  "Cotton-picking Predacon 
rust buckets."

---

Groove took out his photon pistol and set it to a low setting, using it like 
a welder on First Aid's wounds.

---

Blades followed Groove's example, and used his own photon pistol to help fix 
up First Aid roughly.

---

First Aid remained unconsciouss, to much mech-fluid gone to reverse the 
damage by merely closing the wounds up.  He needed a CR, and fast.

---

Streetwise continued to keep his photon pistol at the ready, not trusting 
these Predacons in the slightest.

===

Demon Wulf turned his head, seeing Dark Claw pull up next to him and Flesh 
Ripper pad up to his other side.

"Transform my brethren." he growled.

---

Dark Claw transformed to biped mode, looking at the small number of Maxis 
around Iron Raptor.  "Pathetic." he smiled.

---

Flesh Ripper transformed from his hyena mode to biped mode, remaining silent 
but keeping his claws out.

===

Sun Crusher stopped near the hole in the bridge, knowing a shield protected 
it.  He looked to Reflector who was on his way.

The Brotherhood member hovered in the air, waiting.

---

Reflector was only a dozen or so meters from Sun Crusher and closing rapidly.

===

Scattershot tossed Nemesis over his shoulder.

"Well 'Emperor', so much for you." he laughed madly, launching into the air 
in the direction of Spain.

===

Vehement looked through the hole in the hull of the CF, seeing and sensing 
Sun Crusher.  He turned back to the other two robots in the room with him.  
He awaited a response.  If he wasn't let out soon, he'd leave forcefully.

---

Unitron trained his rifle on the door, waiting.  He wanted to be ready in 
case hostilities started up again.  

---

Firestarter armed a pair of missiles, hoping hostilities WOULD start up 
again.  He wanted to gut some inferior Maxis.
